Package inra.ijpb.measure

Quantitative measurements on 2D and 3D images.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllTests  
    GeometricMeasures2D
    Provides a set of static methods to compute geometric measures such as area, perimeter, and their densities in planar binary or label images.
    GeometricMeasures2DTest  
    GeometricMeasures3D
    Provides a set of static methods to compute geometric measures in 3D binary or label images.
    GeometricMeasures3DTest  
    GeometryUtils
    Some utilities for geometric computations.
    GeometryUtilsTest  
    IntensityMeasures
    Class to facilitate the calculation of intensity measures by grouping together voxels belonging to the same label.
    LabeledVoxelsMeasure
    Mother class to extract measures from pairs of grayscale and labeled images.
    RegionAdjacencyGraph
    Contains several methods for extracting the set of adjacencies between regions in a label image.
    RegionAdjacencyGraph.LabelPair
    Used to stores the adjacency information between two regions.
    RegionAdjacencyGraphTest  
    Vector3d
    Represents a triplet of coordinates in linear space, and provides some computing methods.
    Vector3dTest  

Package inra.ijpb.measure Description

Quantitative measurements on 2D and 3D images.
